name: Sollip Kimchi
description: We are a Korean family restaurant (@sollip_restaurant) who are making healthy traditional kimchi delivered locally to your door. Sharing our love of Korean food to help support your immune system and surprise your taste buds with fiery, tangy flavours. Delivering to Dulwich and surrounding areas. 50p discount for any jar returned to us at the next delivery. Place your order via email.
safetyTips: All our jars are sanitised and delivered with respect to social distancing measures.
